summary: WAS DRIVING VEHICLE WITH CRUISE CONTROL SET AT 45 WHEN IT SUDDENLY ACCELERATED IN ITS OWN, CANCELLED CRUISE CONTROL BUT IT CONTINUED TO ACCELERATE BRAKES HARD AND THROTTLE CONTROL LIGHT LIGHT CAME IN ON DASH, ENGINE CONTINUED TO REV UP BUT WAS NOT EFFECTING SPEED AND VAN DECELERATED TO 10-15 MPH IN ITS OWN *DT  *JS
